name: Conditions concerning qualifications for licensure examination
text: §457B-3.1  Conditions concerning qualifications for licensure examination.  The director shall adopt rules setting minimum educational, training, and experience qualifications that must be satisfied before an applicant is allowed to sit for the licensing examination. [L 1985, c 199, §1; am L 1989, c 103, §2; am L 1994, c 184, §4; am L 1997, c 235, §4]
